item.title: Champions League final: Test your knowledge
item.description: As Real Madrid & Atletico Madrid meet in the Champions League final for the second time in three years, test your knowledge on one of Europe's fiercest derbies.
item.ExtractedText: Updated 1134 GMT (1934 HKT) May 25, 2016 (CNN) Real Madrid and Atletico Madrid are set to meet in the Champions League final for the second time in three years. In 2014, Real ran out 4-1 winners in Lisbon after extra time to secure 'La Decima' -- the club's tenth European Cup. On May 28 in Milan, Atleti will be hoping to avenge the painful defeat to its city rival and win the European Cup for the first time in its history. Saturday's showpiece will be the third time Atleti have reached the final. In 1974, the club were beaten 4-0 by Bayern Munich in a replay in Brussels after the first game ended 1-1. But how much do you know about the history and rivalry between these two giants of Spanish football? Test your knowledge on the Madrid Derby to see where you rank among the greats.
